group_1.textCenter: (…I don't regret becomin' a Magical Girl, but…)
(Still, when I found out the truth behind Witches,)
(I felt like I got cheated by Kyubey@for leavin' out this important information.)
(Guess they're way more forgiving than I am.)

group_1.textRight: What's wrong?@Is everything all right…?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, uhh…@Just thinkin' about some stuff!

group_1.textRight: Are you…worried about something…?

group_1.textLeft: Nah, it ain't anything serious.
I was just thinkin' that you guys
sure seem to put a lot of faith in what Kyubey@has to say.

group_1.textRight: Well, the great Kyūbē has never been wrong before.
I'm sure that he knows more about the future
than us, who are merely Magical Girls.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, guess that makes sense.

group_1.textRight: In the past, the Land of the Rising Sun@has been saved thanks to the great Kyūbē.
And he recommended that we come to Kamihama.
If we can acquire the Automatic Purification System@that he told us about…
We can still be of use…
…to the Land of the Rising Sun.

group_1.textLeft: (To the…Land of the Rising Sun…?)
Hrmm…
Ah, sorry…
Can ya give me a moment to think about it?

group_1.textRight: I don't mind, but…what are you unsure of?

group_1.textLeft: Well, ya see…
I'm tryin' to decide if I wanna stay part of the Tokime.

group_1.textCenter: Isn't it kinda late to decide if you're joining us@or not?!

group_1.textRight: If you're thinking about it, then…

group_1.textLeft: Are you saying that you might quit our group?!

group_1.textRight: Did we say something to offend you…?
I can apologize for it!@Truly, I am deeply sorry!

group_1.textLeft: Ahh, my bad, my bad!@I didn't mean it like that, really.
It's not that I dislike you guys or nothin'.

group_1.textRight: Th-then…

group_1.textLeft: But I dunno if we're gonna mesh that well.

group_1.textRight: Why? Is something wrong…?

group_1.textLeft: Nah, I was just thinking…
You guys have all been living as part of@the Tokime clan.
So you've seen how stuff works around here,@and it's shaped your mindsets.

group_1.textRight: Right…

group_1.textLeft: I feel like I'm the odd one out…@Can I really join just ‘cause of my blood?
I don't think that'd be fair for me or the Tokime,@ya know?
(Honestly, I don't know how to explain to them…)
(that there's a difference between@my tolerance levels and the Tokime clan's.)
(It feels like the gap between us is just too big…)

group_1.textRight: I am surprised that you've been thinking about that@sort of thing…
But I understand. We won't force you.
But…even with that…
Are you not gonna fight beside us, Ryouko…?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, don't get me wrong.
I care about you guys too,@and I wanna help the Tokime as much as I can.
But I don't know enough about the clan yet.
I don't wanna join up with you all halfhearted@like this.

group_1.textRight: Then… Why don't we help you get to know@the Tokime clan better?

group_1.textLeft: Sure, that'd be great.
So, how ‘bout we…
head on over to Tokime Village!
(If I still…don't feel comfortable there, then…)
(I'll…)

group_1.textCenter: There's nothin' worse than actin' recklessly@out of justice.
